p: If instituted with an average 2-year enrollment time frame (Scenario 1), for the CCP intervention scale-up to become cost effective, the interventionâ€™s effect size must be increased from an RR of 1.11 to an RR of 1.37, or the year-one cost per client must be decreased by more than 41.7%, from $7,274 to $4,241.
